column4: if in the man pages of a command, it has something like "-e, --delete" how do you impliment the --delete, ie COMMAND --delete, or COMMAND -e--delete???
but -e then has about five different options, so it has -e then --delete, --delete-before, --delete-during - so -e on its own gives you which of the sub options?
i am unsure, it depends per program
